processingCommand.script:
response=$(curl -X POST --insecure \n  "${SERVER}/automatenow/api/folder/create" \n    --header "Accept: application/json" \n    --header "Authorization: Bearer ${ACCESS_TOKEN}" \n    --header "Domain: ${domain}" \n    --data "id=${UC_NAME}" 2>&1)

  status_code=$(echo $response  | grep '"status":' |  sed 's/\(.*\)"status":\(.\),"\(.*\)/\2/')
  if [ "${status_code}" = "0" ]; then
    echo "---------Create folder: ${UC_NAME} in domain: ${domain} is SUCCEDED---------"
  else
    echo "---------Create folder: ${UC_NAME} in domain: ${domain} is FAILED---------"
    exit 1
  fi
